string.text: You're lashed belowdecks and given rudimentary tasks while the sailors jeer. The salt stings in your wounds as the ship cuts through grey water.
Do the work and avoid trouble.
Pick a fight with the nearest sailor.
A grizzled deckhand takes pity on you and offers a small knife in exchange for a favor — a chance to trade for a tool that may help you later.
Accept the trade and keep the knife.
You are forced to help furl sails high on the mast. The work is dangerous but if you prove useful the crew may treat you better — or the height may break you.
Work carefully and prove your worth.
Climb recklessly and try to jump for it.
